testcase.name: testPostAPI

error.message: Expected response body to be verified as JSON, HTML or XML but content-type 'text/plain' is not supported out of the box. Try registering a custom parser using: RestAssured.registerParser("text/plain", <parser type>); Content was: Moved Permanently. Redirecting to /api/v0.1/countries/population/cities/q?city=lagos
